C2 the money that is used for a particular purpose, especially by a government or organization: government spending on health spending cuts Consumer spending has more than doubled in the last ten years.
More examplesFewer examplesThe government and the opposition parties have clashed over the cuts in defence spending.The government is trying to control spending.With the housing market picking up and consumer spending buoyant, it appears that the feelgood factor has returned.The prime minister has announced that public spending will be increased next year.There was a modest rise in high-street spending last month.
